hero.subtitle: IT Infrastructure & Support ¬∑ Project Management
hero.intro:
Hi, I‚Äôm Muhammad Fauzan (you can call me Ojan).
I have over 10 years of experience in IT Support and Infrastructure.

about.heading: About Me
about.story:
I graduated from Bina Nusantara University, majoring in Information Systems (class of 2015).
Since then, I‚Äôve built a career in IT Support and have spent over 10 years in this field.

I enjoy working in IT Support because I get to collaborate with people across different departments ‚Äî not only fixing technical issues, but also building strong working relationships.

Beyond daily troubleshooting, I continuously develop my skills in networking and cyber security. For me, IT Support also means good documentation, asset management, system monitoring, and ensuring infrastructure security remains robust.

I believe a combination of technical capability, clear communication, and disciplined documentation is essential for a stable and efficient IT environment.
focus: ‚Ä¢ Exploring roles aligned with my experience & career vision
‚Ä¢ Building professional connections on LinkedIn & IT communities
‚Ä¢ Attending professional trainings & certifications (Fortinet, ITIL, Cyber Academy)
‚Ä¢ Taking courses to keep up with new technologies

points: Managed-service transition for 40+ hospitals, 78‚Äì80 IT Support & 7 Helpdesk.

points: LAN/WAN, WAP, and VPN administration; HW/SW troubleshooting.
